rooms.description: Spacious living area designed to promote energy flow and community interaction.
Functional kitchen with a view towards the east for auspicious beginnings.
Private bedroom oriented to receive positive energy and natural light.
Quiet study area with bookshelves integrated into wall design for a calm learning environment.
Convenient bathroom facility for guests located away from master bedroom for privacy and proper drainage.

openings.description: Double door for the two-car garage.

additional_features.description: The design includes separate levels for industrial functionality, residential living, and additional commercial usage ensuring adherence to local building norms.
